entry.summary:
Vendor: Ideal Innovations
Type: Standard Lights
Price: 256.72

[shortdesc]
  • High-impact resistant polycarbonate head is virtually indestructible under normal industrial use, eliminating the need for frequent, costly repairs and leaves maintenance crews to be more productive
  • Shock-resistant head weighs 50 percent less than conventional metal heads and bulb is protected by wire guard
  • Bulb not included
  • Many workers have been burned when touching a hot head lamp
  • The polycarbonate head resists high heat build up of conventional dock light heads
  • Safety yellow powder coating finish promotes high-visibility and is rust-resistant
  • Anchors with sturdy, all-metal bracket and four 7/16 Inch (11 mm) mounting holes to spread weight and transfer load
  • Arms are made from 1-1/2 Inch (38 mm), 14-gauge square steel tubing in a double-strut design.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Color Yellow
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Standard Lights

  • Polycarbonate head resists high heat build up of conventional dock light heads.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Ideal Innovations
Type: Gooseneck Lights
Price: 407.00

[shortdesc]
  • The ideal solution for both dock and task lighting applications
  • Robust light fixture with flexible stainless steel arm that will not sag and no internal cooling fan is required, reducing energy consumption
  • Can be rotated 180 degrees for use in any direction.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Ideal Innovations
    Color Yellow
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Gooseneck Lights

    Product Information

  • Impact and heat resistant polycarbonate light head
  • Uses 18 watts of power, but provides as much light as a 150 watt incandescent bulb with a 3 year warranty on the bulb.
  • Rugged arm assembly incorporates flexible conduit with a steel elbow that simplifies positioning.
  • Unique, flexible stainless steel arm extends 27 Inch above housing, easily bending around most dock track doors
  • With a 2 Inch industrial grade stainless steel conduit.
  • Conveniently placed on/off switch with a six foot power cord with strain relief and NEMA 5-15 plug.
